title: Enchanting Mogra Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
materials: Crafted in high-quality gold with a lustrous finish. Adorned with a central pear-shaped emerald of exceptional clarity. Embellished with sparkling cubic zirconia with ruby accent stones. Features delicate pearl dangles.
features: This contemporary Haaram reimagines traditional floral motifs in a modern design. The mogra (jasmine flower) design is intricately set with high quality CZ stones and small rubies in between adding a pop of color. The central emerald is the focal point. Pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance. The setting emphasizes the brilliance of the stones, creating a mesmerizing sparkle.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emerald
subtle red highlights from the rubies
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional attire and contemporary ensembles. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: This haaram is a perfect fusion of tradition and modernity. The meticulously crafted mogra design and vibrant gemstone colors make it a timeless piece. The high-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. Its design reflects South Indian heritage while maintaining a contemporary flair.
